title: bpovtmg
author: bpovtmg
created_time: September 26, 2022, 10:01:40 AMLast edit: October 05, 2022, 09:40:21 PM by bpovtmg
content: Hey, fellow bitcoiners, etherians, monerians, dashers, lightning people and other creatures from the outer crypto space!Let's have some fun again!Herewith, I announce a BTC LIGHTNING GIVEWAY  (GIVEAWAY #4)!THIS GIVEAWAY IS INTENDED AS A PROMOTION OF BITCOIN LIGHTNING TECHNOLOGY.Rules are simple:* No hidden fees, honestly absolutely free, because it's JUST FOR FUN* Post  a message with any number you like from 1 to 10 in this thread* As soon as all the numbers from 1 to 10 have been taken, I will use RANDOM.ORG to have a random draw and the 1st winner gets a $2 equivalent in Bitcoin Lightning, the 2nd and 3rd winners get $1 (btc lightning) each!SELECT A FREE, NOT-YET-TAKEN NUMBER YOU LIKE AND POST IT IN THIS THREAD:1 - joksim2992 - topbitcoin3 - huynhthai12384 (WINNER #3 - gets $1 in BTC Lightning, check your Inbox)4 - markzenn115 - Bitbollo6 - Danydee (WINNER #2 - gets $1 in BTC Lightning, check your Inbox)7 - cumakoff8 - Official_krs (WINNER #1 - gets $2 in BTC Lightning, check your Inbox)9 - Saint-Loup10 - FatFork****************************************************************THE RESULTS OF THE RECENT GIVEAWAYS ARE HERE:https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5275193.0https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5275710.0https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5355710****************************************************************

comments.body: Guys, RANDOM.ORG selected the Winners. Check out the first message of this thread! The winners will find their gifts in the Inbox.Congrats to ALL and thanks for participation.
